channel.title: Malicious Link Quickly Spreading Through Steam, Be Advised
channel.description:
If you get a message that looks like this from anybody
4x4Chevrolet: You will exchange this thing? *omitted*/Screen_19521.png
Do NOT click it at all, not even in your regular browser, I'm not sure of the intentions of the malware at the time but, it causes your Steam account to send this message to all your friends, I'm not sure exactly what this takes control of, if it just stops there or does more damage, but just be careful.

item.title: Malicious Link Quickly Spreading Through Steam, Be Advised
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:14, topic:547826”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=666732.msg4457925#msg4457925 date=1415980324]
I PM’d it to you.
[/quote]

Thanks. It looks like the site it was hosted on have removed it now though, so I can’t get the actual code.[/quote]
I’ll see if my friend still has it on his PC, if so I’ll upload it somewhere and send it to you.

Read full topic

I’d want to look but wouldn’t know where to start.
[/quote]
Yeah me and Jal were doing some research on it, he actually ran it just to see what it would do lol.[/quote]
That bitch doesn’t talk to me anymore. xD

item.title: Malicious Link Quickly Spreading Through Steam, Be Advised
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Mopman:

Could you get the actual link? I’m interested in seeing what it does if possible.

I PM’d it to you. I’m thinking that it only works if you try to open it inside the steam browser, it downloads a screen saver file if you do it in a regular browser.
Nope, tested and it does it no matter where you run it.

Read full topic
